title: To amend the provisions of chapters 83 and 84 of title 5, United States Code, which relates to the deposit required in the case of an election to provide a survivor annuity to a spouse by a post-retirement marriage or a former spouse.
content: Revises Civil Service and Federal Employees' Retirement Systems provisions with respect to the deposit required in the case of an election to provide a survivor annuity to a spouse by a post-retirement marriage or to a former spouse.
